extension.searchTitle: To provide for the prohibition on cash payments to the Government of Iran, and for other purposes.; Prohibiting Future Ransom Payments to Iran;H.R. 5931 (RH)

titleInfo.title: To provide for the prohibition on cash payments to the Government of Iran, and for other purposes.
Prohibiting Future Ransom Payments to Iran

extension.shortTitle: Prohibiting Future Ransom Payments to Iran
extension.action: Mr. Royce (for himself, Mr. Zeldin, Ms. Ros-Lehtinen, Mr. Nunes, Mr. Meadows, Mr. Thornberry, Mr. Sessions, Mr. Donovan, Mr. McCaul, Mr. Dent, Mr. Chaffetz, Mr. Conaway, Mr. Rohrabacher, Mr. Ribble, Mr. Trott, Mr. Young of Iowa, Mr. DesJarlais, Mr. Cook, Mr. Pittenger, Mr. DeSantis, Mr. Duffy, Mr. Stivers, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Mr. Yoho, Mr. Rothfus, Mr. Chabot, and Mr. Williams) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

Additional sponsors: Mr. Salmon, Mr. Barr, Mr. Emmer of Minnesota, Mr. Abraham, Mr. Garrett, Mr. Marino, Mr. Gibson, Mr. Posey, Mr. Kelly of Mississippi, Mr. Messer, Mr. Burgess, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mr. Flores, Mr. Huizenga of Michigan, Mr. King of New York, Mr. Olson, Mrs. Wagner, Mr. Blum, Mr. LaMalfa, Mr. Goodlatte, Mr. Jody B. Hice of Georgia, Mr. Collins of New York, Mr. Ross, Mr. Pompeo, Mr. Allen, Mr. Mulvaney, Mr. Rokita, Mr. Bost, Mr. Harper, Mr. Bucshon, Mr. Valadao, Mr. Bishop of Michigan, Mr. Smith of New Jersey, Mr. Wilson of South Carolina, Mr. Ratcliffe, Mr. Marchant, Mr. Roe of Tennessee, Mr. Calvert, Mr. Shimkus, Mr. Smith of Texas, Mr. Murphy of Pennsylvania, Mr. Gosar, Mr. Turner, and Mr. Wenstrup
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed

congMember.name: Mr. Jody B. Hice of Georgia
